body: Some half-orcs have escaped from slavery and reforged the chains of their imprisonment into deadly weapons. Half-orcs with this racial trait are proficient with flails and heavy flails, and treat dire flails and spiked chains as martial weapons. This racial trait replaces weapon familiarity.
name: Chain Fighter
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Half-Orcs/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Chain Fighter
